name: markdowntohtml
description: Transforms Markdown formatted String into HTML.

params.name: string
params.description: A Markdown formatted string or a path to a file containf a markdown formatted string to convert to HTML

params.name: safeMode
params.description: If set to true it does escape unsafe HTML tags

params.name: encoding
params.description: Charset, only used in case the argument markdown contains a file path
